title: About
text:
winston whitenasa pathways, hax lab, penn state

hello there! i am a graduate student at the state university - park pursuing my m.s. in cybersecurity analytics and operations! research focus is iot security firmware analysis, advised by dr. peng liu from s2 group lab. also an active contributor to open-source lab with professor bryan ollendyke dave fusco.
